itemDescription: Vicar apostolic of England and Wales (1776-1849)

wikipedia_page.main: Bishop Thomas Walsh (3 October 1777 –18 February 1849) was a Roman Catholic clergyman and Vicar Apostolic who served the Midlands area of the United Kingdom.
